nodes.text: Hathe'k was a Gree who visited the space station Vaiken Spacedock during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Hathe'k was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic around the time of the release Game Update 3.2: Rise of the Emperor on April 28, 2015. Hathe'k and the Carrick Station counterpart Thaln'k sell the "White Acute Module," which is an item that can disable the promotional 12x experience boost provided to players starting on May 4.
